Package hr.fer.zemris.java.hw12.jvdraw.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppendAction
    Action opens JFileChooser dialogue and appends all geometrical objects in file to the current drawing.
    ClearAction
    Clears current drawing, after asking user to save changes.
    DeleteAction
    Deletes currently selected list items from drawing.
    ExitAction
    Checks if drawing was modified, asks user to save changes and terminates the application.
    ExportAction
    Exports drawing to rasterized image.
    LowerAction
    Lowers z-index of currently selected list items by one.
    OpenAction
    Action opens JFileChooser dialogue and loads all geometrical objects in file to the current drawing.
    RaiseAction
    Raises z-index of currently selected list items by one.
    SaveAction
    Saves drawing to vector graphics file.
    SaveAsAction
    Saves drawing to new vector graphics file.
    Util
    Utility class offering common methods shared by multiple actions.
